However, when moving the robot forward it says that the robot is moving backwards on the field, and when moving to the right it says  the robot is moving to the left.  When I negate the position, moving the robot sets the position accurately, but pathplanner sets the position negative to where it should be.\u003cbr\u003e\nBasically, either pathplanner or moving sets the position of the robot using the correct sign, never both.
